page.title: 09EMPLOYMENT,OCCUPATIONS
page.content:
THE LARGEST {EMPLOYER}IN APPLEDORE IS{ {SCOTLAND AND BATES}GARARGE AND COACH HIRE FIRM. {FARMING}EMPLOYS THE NEXT LARGEST NUMBER (ALTHOUGH MANY EMPLOYED ON A PART-TIME SEASONAL BASIS ) ON SOME 15 TO 20 FARMS AND SMALLHOLDINGS. {THE SOUTHERN WATER AUTHORTY }FOLLOWED BY{KENT COUNTY COUNCIL}ARE THE NEXT LARGEST EMPLOYERS. AROUND A SEVENTH OF VILLAGERS ARE SELF EMPLOYED. THERE IS LITTLE UNEMPLOYMENT. AMONG THE VILLAGERS SOME HAVE TAKEN EARLY RETIREMENT, SOME WOMEN WORK IN THE HOME,OTHERS FIND EMPLOYMENT DOING HOUSEWORK OR WORKING IN ONE OF THE VILLAGES SHOPS AND THE VILLAGE PUBS. THE FORGE AND HAYNES AGRICULTURAL ENGINEERS ALSO EMPLOY SMALL NUMBERS.
{ }
